questions.question: How many chapters (Surahs) are in the Quran?
What is the first Surah of the Quran?
questions.explanation: Al-Fatiha is the opening chapter of the Quran.

questions.question: In which month was the Quran revealed?
questions.explanation: The Quran was first revealed to Prophet Muhammad in the month of Ramadan.

questions.question: Who brought the Quran to Prophet Muhammad?
questions.explanation: Angel Jibril (Gabriel) brought the revelation of the Quran to Prophet Muhammad.

questions.question: What is the longest Surah in the Quran?
questions.explanation: Al-Baqarah (The Cow) is the longest Surah with 286 verses.

questions.question: What is the shortest Surah in the Quran?
questions.explanation: Al-Kawthar is the shortest Surah with only 3 verses.

questions.question: How many verses are in Al-Fatiha?
questions.explanation: Al-Fatiha has 7 verses and is recited in every prayer.

questions.question: In which language was the Quran revealed?
questions.explanation: The Quran was revealed in Arabic.

questions.question: How many parts (Juz) is the Quran divided into?
questions.explanation: The Quran is divided into 30 Juz (parts) for easier reading.
